message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I'm only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to a mutual agreement.
